issue.message: JCenter Maven repository is no longer receiving updates: newer library versions may be available elsewhere
JCenter Maven repository is no longer receiving updates: newer library versions may be available elsewhere
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE no longer provides write access when targeting Android 10+
This RelativeLayout should use `android:layout_height="wrap_content"`
Attribute `android:inputType` should not be used with `<TextView>`: Change element type to `<EditText>` ?
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.

A newer version of com.google.code.gson:gson than 2.8.6 is available: 2.9.1
A newer version of com.google.guava:guava than 23.3-android is available: 24.1-jre

Google Play will soon require that apps target API level 31 or higher. This will be required for new apps in August 2022, and for updates to existing apps in November 2022.

This folder configuration (`v21`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 21. Merge all the resources in this folder into `values`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `AudioPlayer` which has field `mContext` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Do not place Android context classes in static fields; this is a memory leak
